attributes.action: Call an immediate General Election to make Parliament more respectable after the shambolic expenses row
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now time that a General Election was held to rid this current Parliament of those greedy MP's who made outrageous expenses claims, the people of this country deserve better than this current crop of MP's. A new Parliament with new MP's is what is now needed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
